title: Le Bonheur est Dans le The
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Teashop and restaurant in central Poitiers. The menu includes several vegetarian choices and typically at least one vegan main course and dessert option. Teahouse is open from noon to early evening for mainly tea, vegetable/fruit juice or coffee with light lunch or tea menu. Friday and Saturday evenings (only summer months) offer more fully restaurant menus with organic wine or beer. Cozy space on 2 floors plus a terrace.
